object-fit--contain.title: Contain object fit
object-fit--contain.description: Scales the content to fit within the container while maintaining aspect ratio.

object-fit--cover.title: Cover object fit
object-fit--cover.description: Scales the content to cover the container while maintaining aspect ratio.

object-fit--fill.title: Fill object fit
object-fit--fill.description: Stretches the content to fill the container, ignoring aspect ratio.

object-fit--none.title: No object fit
object-fit--none.description: Displays the content at its original size without scaling.

object-fit--scaled.title: Scale down object fit
object-fit--scaled.description: Scales the content down to fit the container while maintaining aspect ratio.

object-pos--tl.title: Top left object position
object-pos--tl.description: Positions the object content at the top-left corner of the container.

object-pos--t.title: Top object position
object-pos--t.description: Positions the object content at the top center of the container.

object-pos--tr.title: Top right object position
object-pos--tr.description: Positions the object content at the top-right corner of the container.

object-pos--l.title: Left object position
object-pos--l.description: Positions the object content at the left center of the container.

object-pos--center.title: Center object position
object-pos--center.description: Positions the object content at the center of the container.

object-pos--r.title: Right object position
object-pos--r.description: Positions the object content at the right center of the container.

object-pos--bl.title: Bottom left object position
object-pos--bl.description: Positions the object content at the bottom-left corner of the container.

object-pos--b.title: Bottom object position
object-pos--b.description: Positions the object content at the bottom center of the container.

object-pos--br.title: Bottom right object position
object-pos--br.description: Positions the object content at the bottom-right corner of the container.
